Please share if you have visited…

@timcaynes @PhilipMorton I don’t play game. Likely to get a blu ray hd player (aka Planet Earth 2 wow machine) + Apple TV 4k.
Plus got to figure out my SACD and DVD-Audio. I hate standard wars. Thanks for playing #pickATvforFab :)
@timcaynes That seems very cheap (looking for 55”). Which best buys start around £650

@timcaynes @PhilipMorton Yeah. I assumed 4k HDR was now mature... I like to buy tech at the right time so I can keep it a while.
Might be cost efficient getting a basic 4k tv now and upgrading sooner than usual (say 5y), rather that high medium one now...

@PhilipMorton I wish Apple made a TV, and I’d just get that one.
The Apple that make the iPhone X, not the one that still sells a Mac Mini that’s 4.5 years old for the same initial price.

Uber #firstWorldProblem but buying AV tech is impossibly complicated, and I studied that shit.

Endless list of norms (4K is easy, but LED, OLED, QLED? HDR, but HDR10, HDR10+, Dolby Vision, or HDR HLG), manufacturer with a millions different models across countries...

So smart tech friendly peeps, what’s the best tool to get data from my bank accounts, categorise expenses and have that autoupdate?

UI copy is a skill. This fails at all level.
1) I manually disabled Reminders, I shouldn’t see that patronizing dialog.
2) The question part just say the same thing 3x
3) I didn’t start anything, there should be no “cancel” option. Should be “Keep off”. https://t.co/5LMRe6XWSl
Don’t think Asus advertisers understand laptop ergonomics or likely context of use. https://t.co/Ji8vCd6fjG
RT @panu: Rephrasing: A canvas is a template to map what you know and what you don't know. You need a process and methods to fill it.
@ModernClo That’s a nice way to put it ;-)
@ModernClo Nah, freelancing didn’t last as I got hired as a perm by my first client. Am now looking after the UX of Rightmove public site and app.
@PhilipMorton A B testing gone wrong.
@anna_debenham The shitier (visually) the better, makes the role repartition obvious. Respect for their craft by not pretending to do it even poorly.

@ModernClo Thanks Chloe, giving it a go now. 
Hope all is well in you part of the world.
